description: Episode of Series "Development of the Child". Examines developmental changes in perception, memory, evaluation and reasoning. Includes Piaget's description of the major stages of development and intelligence and discusses the relevance of attention to detail, recognition and recall memory, conservation of mass and number, and reasoning evaluation.
